suncertify.db.dao
Interface IDao<T extends Persistent>

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Subinterfaces:
IContractorDao
All Known Implementing Classes:
ContractorLocalDao, ContractorRemoteDao
public interface IDao<T extends Persistent>
extends Remote

IDao interface consists of common Data Access Object methods for CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete). This interface can be parametrized by the classes of persistent object - i.e. all classes that extends Persistent class.
IDao interface extends Remote interface as it can be used locally as well as remotely - see Remote for details.

This interface utilizes Data Access Object design pattern.

Author:
Przemyslaw Bielicki

findById

T findById(int id)
                              throws DaoFinderException,
                                     RemoteException
Finds persistent object with given id in the persistent layer.

Parameters:
id - int - id of object to find.
Returns:
T - found persistent object.
Throws:
DaoFinderException - If persistent object with given id cannot be found.
RemoteException - If remote method cannot be invoked - see javadoc for RemoteException for details.

load

List<T> load(String[] filter,
             ComparisonOperator[] operators)
                                throws DaoFinderException,
                                       DaoException,
                                       RemoteException
Loads persistent objects from the persistent layer basing on given filter(s) and relevant comparison operators.

Parameters:
filter - String[] - finder filter.
operators - ComparisonOperator[] - comparison operators for each filter field.
Returns:
List<T> - the list of found persistent objects.
Throws:
DaoFinderException - If no object was found on given filter.
DaoException - If general database failure occurs.
RemoteException - If remote method cannot be invoked - see javadoc for RemoteException for details.
See Also:
DBMain.find(String[])

                             throws DaoStaleObjectException,

Refreshes given object's data from the persistent layer.

Parameters:
persistent - T - object to be refreshed.
Returns:
T - refreshed object from the persistent layer.
Throws:
DaoStaleObjectException - If given object longer exists in the persistent layer (thus cannot be refreshed).
RemoteException - If remote method cannot be invoked - see javadoc for RemoteException for details.

Returns:
